Texts.Chs: 他们让我在城堡里跑来跑去，让我尽情地探索、研究和调查。偶尔我会遇到他们中的一个，他们非常愉快地向我打招呼。我一直在阅读各种各样引人入胜的书籍，我对电子人的理解也在增长。
Texts.Eng: They offered me the run of the castle, to explore, research and investigate to my heart's content. Occasionally I run into one of them and they greet me pleasantly enough. I have been reading all manner of fascinating books, and my understanding of the Glitch is growing.

Texts.Chs:
由鲛人探险家平木·圣咏所著
电子人可能不是表现得最热情的人，但他们的好客是不容置疑的。他们发现我爬上城堡的墙，只是想从塔楼的窗户里看看，就礼貌地邀请我进去。现在，当然，这听起来像是一场陷阱，所以起初有一场混战，但事实证明他们是真诚的。
Texts.Eng:
by Hiraki Corale, Hylotl Adventurer
The Glitch may not be the warmest of people on the outside, but their hospitality is undisputable. They found me scaling the castle wall, simply wanting to have a look through a tower window, and politely invited me inside. Now, of course it sounded like a trap, so there was a bit of a scuffle at first, but it turned out they were genuine.
